Create a virtual reality experience where users can enter a matchbox-sized world and explore the contents inside.
Develop a mobile app that allows users to create their own matchbox-sized ecosystems, complete with miniature plants, animals, and habitats.
Create a puzzle game where players must match different items to their corresponding matchbox compartments.
Develop a matchbox-sized drone that can be controlled by a smartphone app and used for aerial photography or videography.
Create a matchbox-sized mini-golf course that can be played with miniature golf balls and clubs.
